subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Jason Hammel set a career high as Chicago beat Miami, while Texas’ Joey Gallo was called up to the majors as third baseman Adrian Beltre was placed on the disabled list.
snippet: Pitcher Jason Hammel set a career high as Chicago beat Miami, while Texas’ Joey Gallo was called up to the majors as third baseman Adrian Beltre was placed on the disabled list.
